titles: Colonell Fitz-Waters his petition to the honourable House of Commons assembled in Parliament desireth auxiliary forces for the assistance of our poore brethren in Ireland : who being there resident was both a partaker and an eyewitnesse of their miseries : whereunto is added the lamentable estate they are like to fall into without some sudden supply of men for their defence against the rebells.
author: Fitzwaters, Colonel.
notes: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Civil War, 1642-1649 --  Sources.
